author: USA TODAY, Cydney Henderson, USA TODAY
title: Evangeline Lilly apologizes after refusing to self-quarantine amid coronavirus pandemic
description: Evangeline Lilly is apologizing for her controversial stance on refusing to self-quarantining amid the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Tom Hanks and his wife Rita Wilson have tested positive for coronavirus while working in Australia.
USA TODAY
Evangeline Lilly is apologizing for controversially refusing to self-quarantine amid the coronavirus pandemic.
